alert.note: Alert for Butte (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 6:34PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL BUTTE COUNTY THROUGH 715 PM MDT... At 633 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southwest of Two Top Butte, or 17 miles northeast of Belle Fourche, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Two Top Butte around 640 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Castle Rock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
